channel.title: Library on bxcodec
channel.description: Recent content in Library on bxcodec

item.title: Faker
item.description: Struct Data Fake Generator Faker will generate you a fake data based on your Struct. Index Support Getting Started Example Contribution Support You can file an Issue. See documentation in Godoc Getting Started Download go get -u github.com/bxcodec/faker Example With Tag Supported tag: Internet : Email Mac address Domain name Url UserName IP Address (IPV4 IPV6 ) Password Payment : Credit Card Type (VISA, MASTERCARD , AMERICAN EXPRESS ,DISCOVER) Credit Card Number Address :

item.title: Saint : Just a Simple Math Library with Integer Operations
item.description: Saint : Just a Simple Math Library with Integer Operations Download go get -u github.com/bxcodec/saint Example package main import ( "fmt" "github.com/bxcodec/saint" ) func main() { arr:=[] int {2,1,3,5,6} var x int x= saint.Max(arr...) fmt.Println(x) // 6 x= saint.Max(4,3,1,5,7) fmt.Println(x) // 7 x= saint.Min(arr...) fmt.Println(x) // 1 x= saint.Min(4,3,5,5,7) fmt.Println(x) // 3 x= saint.Sum(arr...) fmt.Println(x) // 17 x = saint.Sum(4,5) fmt.Println(x) // 9 }
